mapper.select: select a.proj_id,a.proj_type,a.proj_busin,a.proj_name,a.proj_manager,a.bid_state,a.contract_state,a.budget_amount ,a.budget_percent,budget_complete,a.proj_stepcode FROM t_proj_main a where a.proj_id=#{projId}
mapper.update: update t_proj_main set proj_stepcode=proj_stepcode+#{stepVal} where proj_id=#{projId}
mapper.select: select conseq_id,conseq_name,purchase_state,bid_state,contract_state from t_proj_conseq where proj_id like '%' #{projId} '%' and conseq_state='0'
mapper.update: update t_proj_conseq set conseq_state='-1' where conseq_id=#{conseqId}
mapper.select: select CONCAT('t_ass_',ass_tbl) from t_proj_main where proj_id=#{projId}

select (@rownum:=@rownum+1) as ass_id,t.* from (select @rownum:=0,camera_type as ass_type,camera_name as ass_name,camera_model as ass_model ,camera_code as factory_no,camera_brand as brand_name,camera_state as ass_state from t_ass_camera a where a.proj_id=#{projId}) t

select (@rownum:=@rownum+1) as ass_id,t.* from (select distinct @rownum:=0,camera_type as ass_type,camera_brand as brand_name,count(*) as ass_num from t_ass_camera where proj_id=#{projId} group by camera_type,camera_brand) t
select a.gantt_id,a.gantt_type,a.gantt_proce,a.gantt_time1,a.gantt_time2,a.total,a.sum FROM t_proj_gantt a where a.proj_id=#{projId}

select a.gantt_id as 'id',a.pid as 'pid',a.gantt_type as 'projectName',a.gantt_proce as 'projectElem' ,a.gantt_time1 as 'planStartAt',a.gantt_time2 as 'planEndAt',a.gantt_time1 as 'startAt',a.gantt_time2 as 'endAt' ,CONCAT(ROUND(a.sum/a.total*100,2),'%') as 'persent',datediff(a.gantt_time2,a.gantt_time1) as 'dur' ,a.total as 'total',a.sum as 'sum' FROM t_proj_gantt a where a.proj_id=#{projId}
